note: Low Earth orbit is defined by a point of closest approach to Earth below 2,000 kilometers; medium Earth orbit between 2,000 and 35,586 kilometers; geostationary orbit between 35,586 and 35,986 kilometers; high Earth orbit above 35,986 kilometers.
title: Number of payloads and rocket bodies in space, by orbit
subtitle: Debris from launches or collisions is not counted. Objects are subtracted from the time series after they have reentered the Earth's atmosphere.

relatedQuestions.text: Number of objects in low Earth orbit, by type
